tool_description: Mongodb aggregation is hard. We create query converter from sql to mongodb aggregation pipeline. Easy to use.
name: Easy SQL to MongoDB Aggregation
title: Easy SQL to MongoDB Aggregation

api_list.name: SQL To Mongo Aggregation
api_list.description: Use this API to generate mongodb aggregation pipeline. You must input columns to API. Columns is current column list/scheme.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-sql-to-mongodb-aggregation.p.rapidapi.com/sqltomongo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-sql-to-mongodb-aggregation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-sql-to-mongodb-aggregation.p.rapidapi.com/sqltomongo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-sql-to-mongodb-aggregation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
